Name: Shields Down
Effect: Only Minior can use this Ability. After reaching half or less of its HP in battle, replace Minior by Minior (Core) at full HP. To restore it to its base form, the core must be set free and then recaptured after it returns a few days later.
Description: The Pokemon's core is protected by a sturdy shield, if the shield is shattered the Pokemon starts acting crazy.
